'''Realm of Tranquil Eternity''' is the first [[Inazuma]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album and the seventh album to be released for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 62 tracks composed by Yu-Peng Chen of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The album is divided by three discs: ''Sakura and Violet Thunder'', ''Stories of the Floating World'', and ''Battles of Inazuma''.

The tracklist was announced on September 17, 2021, and the album was later released on September 22.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/571290672536325201 「《原神》稻妻篇OST即将于9月22日上线 」]</ref><ref name="cn_hoyolab">Chinese HoYoLAB: [https://bbs.mihoyo.com/ys/article/9624447 「《原神》稻妻篇OST即将于9月22日上线 」]</ref>
